manzils.text: qasam hai saff baandhne waale (farishto) ki
phir puri tarah daantne waalo ki
phir zikrullah ki tilaawath karne waalo ki
yaqinan tum sab ka maaboodh ek hee hai
asmaano aur zameen aur un ke darmiyaan ki tamaam chizo aur mashriqo ka rab wahi hai
hum ne asmaane dunya ko sitaaro ki zeenath se araasta kiya
aur hifaazath ki, sarkash shaytaan se
aalam baala ke farishto (ki baatho) ko sunne ke liye wo kaan bhi nahi laga sakte, balke har taraf se wo maare jaate hai
bhagaane ke liye aur un ke liye daayimi azaab hai
magar jo koyi ek aadh baath uchak le bhaage to (fauran hee) us ke piche dahekta hoa shula lag jaata hai
un kaafiro se pucho to ke aya un ka paida karna zyaada dushwaar hai ya (un ka) jinhe hum ne (un ke alaawa) paida kiya hai? hum ne (insaano) ko lais daar mitthi se payda kiya hai
balke tu ta’ajjub kar raha hai, aur ye masqara pan kar rahe hai
aur jab unhe nasihath ki jaati hai, ye nahi maante
aur jab kisi maujeze ko dekhte hai, to mazaaq udaate hai
aur kehte hai ke ye to bilkul khullam khulla jaadu hee hai
kya jab hum mar jayenge aur qaak aur haddi ho jayenge, phir kya (sach moch) hum uthaaye jayenge
kya hum se pehle ke hamaare baap dada bhi
Aap jawaab di jiye ke haan haan aur tum zaleel (bhi) honge
wo to sirf ek zoor ki jhidki hai, ke yeka yek ye dekhne lagenge
aur kahenge ke haay hamaari qaraabi, yahi jaza (saza) ka din hai
yahi faisle ka din hai jise tum jhutlaate rahe
zaalimo ko aur un ke hum raahiyo ko aur (jin) jin ki wo Allah ke alaawa parastish karte thein
(un sab ko) jama kar ke unhe dozakh ki raah dikha do
aur unhe tehra lo (is liye) ke un se (zaruri) sawaal kiye jaane waale hai
tumhe kya ho gaya hai ke (us waqt) tum ek dosre ki madad nahi karte
balke wo (sab ke sab) aaj farma bardaar ban gaye
wo ek dosre ki taraf mutawajje ho kar sawaal wa jawaab karne lagenge
kahenge ke tum to hamaare paas hamaari daayi taraf se aate thein
wo jawaab denge ke nahi, balke tum hee imaan daar na thein
aur kuch hamaara zoor to tum par tha (hee) nahi balke tum khud hee sarkash log thein
ab to hum (sab) par hamaare rab ki ye baath saabith ho chuki, ke hum (azaab) chakne waale hai
pas hum ne tumhe gumraah kiya, hum to khud bhi gumraah hee thein
so ab aaj ke din to (sab ke sab) azaab mein shareek hai
hum gunehgaaro ke saath isi tarah kiya karte hai
ye wo (log) hai ke jab un se kaha jaata hai ke Allah ke siva koyi maaboodh nahi, to ye sarkashi karte thein
aur kehte thein ke kya hum apne mabudho ko ek diwaane shaayar ki baath par chohd de
(nahi nahi) balke (nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) to haq (saccha deen) laaye hai aur sab rasulo ko saccha jaante hai
yaqinan tum dardnaak azaab ka maza chakne waale ho
tumhe osi ka badhla diya jayega jo tum karte thein
magar Allah ta’ala ke qaalis bar guzida bandhe
unhee ke liye muqarrara rozi hai
(har tarah ke) mewe aur wo ba-izzath wa ekraam honge
nemato waali jannato mein
taqto par ek dosre ke saamne (baithe) honge
jaari sharaab ke jaam ka un par daur chal raha hoga
jo saaf shaffaaf aur pine mein lazeez hogi
na us se darde sar ho aur na us ke pine se behke
aur un ke paas nichi nazro, badi badi aankho waali (hure) hongi
aisi jaise chupaaye hoye ande
(jannati) ek dosre ki taraf rukh kar ke puchenge
un mein se ek kehne waala kahega ke mera ek saathi tha
jo (mujh se) kaha karta tha ke kya tu (qayaamath ke aane ka) yaqeen karne waalo mein se hai
kya jab ke hum mar kar mitthi aur haddi ho jayenge, kya us waqt hum jaza diye jaane waale hai
kahega tum chaahte ho ke jhaank kar dekh lo
jhaank te hee ose bicho beech jahanna mein (jalta hoa) dehega
kahega wallah!qareeb tha ke tu mujhe (bhi) barbaadh karde
agar mere rab ka ehsaan na hota to main bhi dozakh mein haazir kiye jaane waalo mein hota
kya (ye sahih hai) ke hum marne waale hee nahi
bajuz pehli ek mauth ke aur na hum azaab kiye jaane waale hai
phir to (zaaher baath hai ke) ye badi kamyaabi hai
aisi (kamyaabi) ke liye amal karne waalo ko amal karna chahiye
kya ye mahmaani acchi hai ya sendh(zaqoom) ka daraqt
jise hum ne zaalimo ke liye saqt azmaayesh bana rakha hai
beshak wo daraqt jahannam ki jad mein se nikalta hai
jis ke khoshe shaytaano ke saro jaise hote hai
(jahannami) osi daraqt mein se khayenge aur osi se pet bharenge
phir us par garam jalte jalte paani ki malooni hogi
phir un sab ka lautna jahannam ki (aag ke dher ki) taraf hoga
yaqeen maano! ke unhone apne baap dada ko, behka hoa paya
aur ye unhee ke nishaan khadam par daudte rahe
un se pehle bhi bahuth se agle behek chuke hai
jin mein hum ne daraane waale (rasool) bheje thein
ab tu dekh le ke jinhe dhamkaaya gaya tha, un ka anjaam kaisa kuch hoa
sivaaye Allah ke barguzida bandho ke
aur hamein Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne pukaara, to (dekh lo) hum kaise acche dua qubool karne waale hai
hum ne ose aur us ke ghar waalo ko us zabardasth musibath se bacha liya
aur us ki aulaad ko hum ne baaqi rehne waali bana di
aur hum ne us ka (zikre khair) pichlo mein baaqi rakha
Nuh(alaihissalaam) par tamaam jahaano mein salaam ho
hum neki karne waalo ko isi tarah badhla dete hai
wo hamaare imaandaar bandho mein se tha
phir hum ne dosro ko dubo diya
aur us (Nuh(alaihissalaam) ki taabedaari karne waalo mein se (hee) Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) (bhi) thein
jab ke apne rab ke paas be-ayb dil laaye
unhone apne baap aur apni khaum se kaha ke tum kya pooj rahe ho
kya tum Allah ke siva ghade hoye maboodh chaahte ho
to ye (batlaao ke) tum ne rabbul aalameen ko kya samajh rakha hai
ab Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne ek nigaah sitaaro ki taraf uthaayi
aur kaha main to bimaar hoon
us par wo sab us se mu mude hoye waapas chale gaye
aap (chup chupa te) un ke maboodho ke paas gaye aur farmaane lage, tum khaate kyo nahi
tumhe kya ho gaya hai ke baath tak nahi karte ho
phir to (puri khuwwath ke saath) daaye haath se unhe maarne par pil pade
wo (budh parasth) daude bhaage aap ki taraf mutawajjeh hoye
to aap ne farmaya tum unhe pujhte ho, jinhe khud tum taraashte ho
halaan ke tumhe aur tumhaari banaayi hoyi chizo ko Allah hee ne paida kiya hai
wo kehne lage is ke liye ek makaan banaao aur us dehekti hoyi aag mein ose daal do
unhone to us (Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ke saath makar karna chaaha, lekin hum ne unhee ko nicha kar diya
aur us Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne kaha main to hijrath kar ke apne parvardigaar ki taraf jaane waala hoon, wo zaroor meri rehnumaayi karega
aye mere rub! mujhe nek baqth aulaad ataa farma
to hum ne ose ek burdubaar bacche ki bashaarath di

phir jab wo (baccha) itni umar ko pahoncha ke us ke saath chale phire, to us (Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne kaha, mere pyaare bacche, main qaab mein tujhe zubaah karte hoye dekh raha hoon, ab tu bata ke teri kya raay hai? bete ne jawaab diya ke abba jo hukm hoa hai ose baja laiye, InshaAllah aap mujhe sabr karne waalo mein se payenge
gharz jab duno muti ho gaye aur us ne (baap ne) us ko (bete ko) peshaani ke bal gira diya
to hum ne awaaz di, ke aye Ibraheem(alaihissalaam)
yaqinan tu ne apne qaab ko saccha kar dikhaya, beshak hum neki karne waalo ko isi tarah jaza dete hai
dar haqiqath ye khula imtehaan tha
aur hum ne ek bada zabiha us ke fidye mein de diya
aur hum ne un ka zikr khair pichlo mein baaqi rakha
Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) par salaam ho
hum neko kaaro ko isi tarah badhla dete hai
beshak wo hamaare imaan daar bandho mein se tha
aur hum ne us ko Is’haaq(alaihissalaam) nabi ki bashaarath di, jo saaleh logo mein se hoga
aur hum ne Ibraheem wa Ishaaq(alaihima assalaam) par bartake naazil farmaayi aur un duno ki aulaad mein baaze to nek baqth hai aur baaz apne nafs par sarih zulm karne waale hai
yaqinan hum ne Mosa aur Haroon(alaihima assalaam) par bada ehsaan kiya
aur unhe aur un ki khaum ko bahuth bade dukh dard se najaath de di
aur un ki madad ki to wahi ghaalib rahe
aur hum ne unhe (waazeh aur) roushan kitaab di
aur unhe sidhe raaste par qaayam rakha
aur hum ne un duno ke liye piche aane waalo mein ye baath baaqi rakhi
ke Mosa aur Haroon(alaihima assalaam) par salaam ho
beshak hum nek logo ko isi tarah badhla diya karte hai
yaqinan ye duno hamaare momin bandho mein se thein
beshak Ilyas(alaihissalaam) bhi paighabaro mein se thein
jab ke unhone apni khaum se farmaya ke tum Allah se darte nahi ho
kya tum baal (naami buth) ko pukaarte ho? aur sab se behtar khaaliq ko chohd dete ho
Allah jo tumhaara aur tumhaare agle tamaam baap dadaao ka rab hai
lekin khaum ne unhe jhutlaaya, pas wo zaroor (azaab mein) haazir rakhe jayenge
sivaaye Allah ta’ala ke muqlis bandho ke
hum ne (Ilyas(alaihissalaam) ka zikre khaire pichlo mein bhi baaqi rakha
ke Ilyas(alaihissalaam) par salaam ho
hum neki karne waalo ko isi tarah badhla dete hai
beshak wo hamaare imaandaar bandho mein se thein
beshak Looth(alaihissalaam) bhi paighambaro mein se thein
hum ne unhe aur unke ghar waalo ko sab ko najaath di
bajuz us budhiya ke jo piche reh jaane waalo mein reh gayi
phir hum ne auro ko halaak kar diya
aur tum subaah hone par un ki bastiyo ke paas se guzarte ho
aur raath ko bhi, kya phir bhi nahi samajhte
aur bila shuba Younus(alaihissalaam) nabiyo mein se thein
jab bhaag kar pahonche, bhari kashti par
phir qura andaazi hoyi, to ye maghloob ho gaye
to phir unhe machli ne nigal liya aur wo khud apne aap ko malaamath karne lage
pas agar ye paaki bayaan karne waalo mein se na hote
to logo ke uthaaye jaane ke din tak us ke pet mein hee rehte
pas unhe hum ne chatyal maydaan mein daal diya aur wo us waqt bimaar thein
aur un par saaya karne waala ek bel daar daraqth hum ne uga diya
aur hum ne unhe ek laakh balke aur zyaada aadmiyo ki taraf bheja
pas wo imaan laaye aur hum ne unhe ek zamaane tak aysh wa ishrath di
un se daryaaft ki jiye! ke kya aap ke rab ki to betiyaa hai aur un ke bete hai
ya, ye us waqt maujoodh thein, jab ke hum ne farishto ko mu’annas1 payda kiya
agaah raho! ke ye log sirf apni iftera pardaazi se keh rahe hai
ke Allah ta’ala ki aulaad hai, yaqinan ye mehez jhute hai
kya Allah ta’ala ne apne liye betiyo ko beto par tarji di
tumhe kya ho gaya hai, kaise hukm lagaate phirte ho
kya tum is qadar bhi nahi samajhte
ya tumhaare paas is ki koyi saaf daleel hai
to jaao agar sacche ho, to apni hee kitaab le aao
aur un logo ne to Allah ke aur jinnaath ke darmiyaan bhi qaraabat-daari teh raayi hai, aur halaan ke khud jinaath ko maloom hai ke wo (is aqeede ke log, azaab ke saamne) pesh kiye jayenge
jo kuch ye (Allah ke baare mein) bayaan kar rahe hai, is se Allah ta’ala bilkul paak hai
sivaaye! Allah ke muqlis bandho ke
yaqeen maano ke tum sab aur tumhaare mabudaan (baatil)
kisi ek ko bhi behka nahi sakte
bajuz us ke jo jahannami hee hai
(farishto ka khaul hai ke) hum mein se to har ek ki jageh muqarrar hai
aur hum to (bandagiye ilaahi mein) saf basta khade hai
aur us ki tasbih bayaan kar rahe hai
kuffaar to kaha karte thein
ke agar hamaare saamne agle logo ka zikr hota
to hum bhi Allah ke cheeda bandhe ban jaate
lekin phir is Qur’aan ke saath kufr kar gaye, pas ab an-qareeb jaan lenge
aur albatta hamaara waada pehle hee apne rasulo ke liye saadir ho chuka hai
ke yaqinan wahi madad kiye jayenge
aur hamaara hee lashkar ghaalib (aur bartar) rahega
ab aap kuch dino tak un se mu pher li jiye
aur unhe dekhte rahiye aur ye bhi aage chal kar dekh lenge
kya ye hamaare azaab ki jaldi macha rahe hai
suno! jab hamara azaab un ke maidaan mein utar aayega, us waqt un ki jin ko mutanabbe kar diya gaya tha, badi buri subaah hogi
aap kuch waqt tak un ka qayaal chohd di jiye
aur dekhte rahiye, ye bhi abhi abhi dekh lenge
paak hai aap ka rab jo bahuth badi izzath waala hai, har us cheez se (jo mushrik) bayaan karte hai
paighambaro par salaam hai
aur sab tarah ki tareef Allah ke liye hai, jo saare jahaan ka rab hai
Swaadh! is nasihath waale Qur’aan ki qasam
balke kuffaar ghuroor aur muqaalifath mein pade hoye hai
hum ne un se pehle bhi bahuth si ummato ko tabaah kar daala, unhone har chandh chiq pukaar ki, lekin wo waqth chutkaare ka na tha
aur kaafiro ko is baath par ta’ajjub hoa ke unhee mein se ek unhe daraane waala aa gaya aur kehne lage ke ye to jaadugar aur jhuta hai
kya us ne itne saare mabudho ka ek hee maboodh kar diya, waqeyi ye bahuth hee ajeeb baath hai
un ke sardaar ye kehte hoye chale ke, chalo ji aur apne mabudho par jame raho, yaqinan us baath mein to koyi gharz hai
hum ne to ye baath pichle deen mein bhi nahi suni, kuch nahi, ye to sirf ghadanth hai
kya hum sab mein se isi par kalaame ilaahi naazil kiya gaya hai? dar asl ye log meri wahi ki taraf se shak mein hai, (balke sahih ye hai ke) unhone ab tak mera azaab chaka hee nahi
ya kya un ke paas tere zabardasth fayyaaz rab ke khazaane hai
ya kya asmaan wa zameen aur un ke darmiyaan ki har cheez ki badshaahath unhee ki hai, to phir ye rassiya taan kar chad jaaye
ye bhi (bade bade) lashkaro mein se shikisth paaya hoa (chota sa) lashkar hai
un se pehle bhi khaum nuh aur aadh aur meqo waale faraun ne jhutlaaya tha
aur samoodh ne aur khaum looth ne aur aika ke rehne waalo ne bhi, yahi (bade) lashkar thein
un mein se ek bhi aisa na tha, jis ne rasulo ki takzeeb na ki ho, pas meri saza un par saabith ho gayi
unhe sirf ek cheeq ka intezaar hai jis mein koyi tawaqquf (aur dheel) nahi hai
aur unhone kaha ke aye hamaare rab! hamaari sar nawisht1 tu hamein roze hisaab se pehle hee de de
aap un ki baatho par sabr kare aur hamaare bandhe Dawood(alaihissalaam) ko yaad kare, jo badi khuwwath waala tha, yaqinan wo bahuth rujo karne waala tha
hum ne pahaado ko us ke taabe kar rakha tha, ke us ke saath shaam ko aur subaah ko tasbih qaani kare
aur parindo ko bhi jama ho kar sab ke sab us ke zer farmaan rehte
aur hum ne us ki saltanath ko mazbooth kar diya tha aur ose hikmath di thi aur baath ka faisla karna
aur kya tujhe jhagda karne waalo ki (bhi) qabar mili? jab ke wo diwaar phaandh2 kar mehraab mein aa gaye

jab ye (hazrath) Dawood(alaihissalaam) ke paas pahonche, pas ye un se dar gaye, unhone kaha khauf na ki jiye, hum do fareeq muqaddama hai, hum mein se ek ne dosre par zyaadati ki hai, pas aap hamaare darmiyaan haq ke saath faisla kar di jiye aur na insaafi na ki jiye aur hamien sidhi raah bata dijiye

(suniye) ye mera bhai hai, us ke paas nanni-yaanwe(99) dumbiya hai aur mere paas ek hee dumbi hai, lekin ye mujh se keh raha hai ke apni ye ek bhi mujh hee ko de de aur mujh par baath mein badi saqti baratta hai

aap ne farmaya is ka apni dumbiyo ke saath teri ek dumbi milaane ka sawaal, beshak tere upar ek zulm hai aur aksar hisse daar aur shareek (aise hee hote hai ke) ek dosre par zulm karte hai, sivaaye un ke jo imaan laaye aur jinhone nek amal kiye aur aise log bahuth hee kam hai aur (hazrath) Dawoodh(alaihissalaam) samajh gaye ke hum ne unhe azmaaya hai, phir to apne rub se isteghfaar karne lage aur aajizi karte hoye gir pade aur (puri tarah) rujo kiya
pas hum ne bhi un ka wo qusoor maaf kar diya, yaqinan wo hamaare nazdeek bade martabe waale aur bahuth acche thikaane waale hai

aye Dawoodh! (alaihissalaam) hum ne tumhe zameen mein qalifa bana diya, tum logo ke darmiyaan haq ke saath faisle karo aur apni nafsaani qaahishaath ki pairvi na karo, warna wo tumhe Allah ki raah se bhatka degi, yaqinan jo log Allah ki raah se bhatak jaate hai, un ke liye saqth azaab hai, is liye ke unhone hisaab ke din ko bhula diya hai
aur hum ne asmaan wa zameen aur un ke darmiyaan ki chizo ko na haq paida nahi kiya, ye gumaan to kaafiro ka hai, so kaafiro ke liye qaraabi hai, aag ki
kya hum un logo ko jo imaan laaye aur nek amal kiye, un ke baraabar kar denge jo (hamesha) zameen mein fasaadh machaate rahe ya parhezgaaro ko badh kaaro jaisa kar denge
ye ba barkath kitaab hai jise hum ne aap ki taraf is liye naazil farmaya hai, ke log is ki aayato par ghaur wa fikr kare aur aqal mandh us se nasihath haasil kare
aur hum ne Dawoodh(alaihissalaam) ko Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) (naami farzandh) ata farmaya, jo bada accha bandha tha aur be-hadh rujo karne waala tha
jab un ke saamne shaam ke waqth tez rau qaase ghode pesh kiye gaye
to kehne lage main ne apne parvardigaar ki yaad par in ghudo ki muhabbath ko tarji di, yahaa tak ke aftaab chup gaya
in (ghudo) ko dubara mere saamne laao, phir to pindliyo aur gardano par haath pherna shuro kar diya
aur hum ne Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ki azmaayesh ki aur un ke taqth par ek jism daal diya, phir us ne rujo kiya
kaha ke aye mere rab mujhe baqsh de aur mujhe aisa mulk ata farma jo mere siva kisi (shaqs) ke laayeq na ho, tu bada hee dene waala hai
pas hum ne hawa ko un ke ma taheth kar diya, wo aap ke hukm se jaha aap chaahte narmi se pahoncha diya karti thi
aur (taaqtwar) jinnaath ko bhi (un ka ma teheth kar diya) har imaarath banaane waale ko aur ghoota qoor ko
aur dosre jinnaath ko bhi, jo zanjiro mein jakde rehte
ye hamaara atya, ab tu ehsaan kar ya rok rakh, kuch hisaab nahi
un ke liye hamaare paas bada taqarrub hai aur bahuth accha thikaana hai
aur hamaare bandhe Ayyub(alaihissalaam) ka (bhi) zikr kar jab ke us ne apne rab ko pukaara, ke mujhe shaytaan ne ranj aur dokh pahonchaya hai
apna paao maaro, ye nahaane ka thanda aur pine ka paani hai
aur hum ne ose us ka pura kumba ata farmaya, balke utna hee aur bhi, osi ke saath apni (qaas) rehmath se aur aqal mandho ki nasihath ke liye

aur apne haath mein tinko ka ek muttha (jhaado) le kar maar de aur qasam ka qilaaf na kar, sach to ye hai ke hum ne ose bada saabir bandha paaya, wo bada nek bandha tha aur badi hee raghbath rakhne waala
hamaare bandho Ibraheem, Is’haaq aur Yaqoob(alaihim assalaam) ka bhi logo se zikr karo jo haatho aur aankho waale thein
hum ne unhe ek qaas baath yaani aaqirath ki yaad ke saath maqsoos kar diya tha
ye sab hamaare nazdeek barguzida aur behetreen log thein
Ismail, Yas’aa aur zul kifl(alaihim assalaam) ka bhi zikr kar dijiye, ye sab behetreen log thein
ye nasihath hai aur yaqeen maano ke parhezgaaro ki badi acchi jageh hai
(yaani hameshgi waali) jannate, jin ke darwaaze un ke liye khule hoye hai
jin mein ba faraaghath takiye lagaaye baithe hoye, tarah tarah ke mewe aur qism qism ki sharaabo ki farmaayesh kar rahe hai
aur un ke paas nichi nazro waali hum umr hure hongi
ye hai jis ka waada tum se hisaab ke din ke liye kiya jaata tha
beshak roziya (qaas) hamaara atya hai, jin ka kabhi khaatema hee nahi
ye to hoyi jaza (yaad rakho ke) sarkasho ke liye badi buri jageh hai
dozakh hai jis mein wo jayenge (aah) kya hee bura bichona hai
ye hai, pas ose chake, garam paani aur peep
is ke alaawa aur tarah tarah ke azaab
ye ek khaum hai jo tumhaare saath (aag mein) jaane waali hai, koyi khush aamadeedh un ke liye nahi hai, yahi to jahannam mein jaane waale hai
wo kahenge, balke tum hee ho, jin ke liye koyi khush aamadeedh nahi hai, tum hee ne to ise pehle hee se hamaare saamne la rakha tha, pas rehne ki buri jageh hai
wo kahenge, aye hamaare rab! jis ne (kufr ki rasm) hamaare liye pehle se nikaali ho, us ke haq mein jahannam ki dogni saza karde
aur jahannami kahenge, kya baath hai ke wo log hamein dikhaayi nahi dete jinhe hum bure logo mein shumaar karte thein
kya hum ne hee un ka mazaaq bana rakha tha ya hamaari nigaahe in se hat gayi hai
yaqeen jaanu ke dozakhiyo ka ye jhagda zaroor hee hoga
keh dijiye! ke main to sirf qabardaar karne waala ho aur bajuz Allah waahedh ghaaleb ke, aur koyi laayeq ibaadath nahi
jo parvardigaar hai asmaano aur zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hai, wo zabardasth aur bada baqshne waala hai
aap keh dijiye ke ye bahuth badi qabar hai
jis se tum be-parvah ho rahe ho
mujhe un bulandh qadar farishto ki (baath cheeth ka) koyi ilm hee nahi, jab ke wo takraar kar rahe thein
meri taraf faqth yahi wahi ki jaati hai, ke main to saaf saaf agaah kar dene waala hoon
jab ke aap ke rab ne farishto se irshaad farmaaya, ke main mitthi se insaan ko paida karne waala hoon

Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha main apne aur tumhaare rab ki panaah mein ataa hoon, har us takabbur karne waale shaqs (ki buraayi) se jo roze hisaab par imaan nahi rakhta

aur ek momin shaqs ne jo feraun ke khandaan mein se tha aur apna imaan chupaaye hoye tha, kaha ke kya tum ek shaqs ko mahez is baath par qatl karte ho, ke wo kehta hai ke mera rab Allah hai aur tumhaare rab ki taraf se dalile le kar aaya hai, agar wo jhuta ho, to us ka jhot osi par hai aur agar wo saccha ho to, jis (azaab) ka wo tum se waada kar raha hai, us mein se kuch na kuch to tum par aa padega, Allah ta’ala us ki rehbari nahi karta, jo hadh se guzar jaane waale aur jhute ho

aye meri khaum ke logo! aaj to badshaahath tumhaari hai, ke is zameen par tum ghaalib ho, lekin agar Allah ka azaab hum par aa gaya to kaun hamaari madad karega? feraun bola, main to tumhe wahi raay de raha hoon, jo khud dekh raha hoon aur main to tumhe bhalaayi ki raah hee batla raha hoon
us momin ne kaha aye meri khaum (ke logo) mujhe to andesha hai ke tum par bhi waisa hee roz (badh azaab) na aaye jo aur umaato par aaya
jaise ummath nuh aur aadh wa samoodh aur un ke baadh waalo ka (haal hoa) Allah apne bandho par kisi tarah ka zulm karna nahi chaahta
aur mujhe tum par haank pukaar ke din ka bhi dar hai
jis din tum peet pher kar lautoge, tumhe Allah se bachaane waala koyi na hoga aur jise Allah gumraah karde, us ka haadi koyi nahi

aur us se pehle tumhaare paas (hazrath) Yousuf(alaihissalaam) dalile le kar aaye, phir bhi tum un ki laayi hoyi (daleel) mein shak wa shuba hee karte rahe, yahaa tak ke jab un ki wafaath ho gayi, to kehne lage, un ke baadh to Allah kisi rasool ko bhejega hee nahi, isi tarah Allah gumraah karta hai, har us shaqs ko jo hadh se bad jaane waala, shak wa shuba karne waala ho

jo baghair kisi sanadh ke, jo un ke paas aayi ho, Allah ki aayato mein jhagadte hai, Allah ke nazdik aur momino ke nazdik ye to bahuth badi na raazgi ki cheez hai, Allah ta’ala isi tarah har ek maghroor sarkassh ke dil par muhar kar deta hai
feraun ne kaha aye hamaan mere liye ek bala khaana bana, shaayad ke main asmaan ke jo darwaaze hai

(un) darwaazo tak pahonch jaao aur Mosa(alaihissalaam) ke maboodh ko jhaank lo aur beshak main samajhta hoon wo jhota hai aur isi tarah feraun ki badh kirdarya ose bhali dikhaayi gayi aur raah se rok diya gaya, feraun ki (har) hila saazi tabaahi mein hee rahi
aur us momin shaqs ne kaha ke aye meri khaum ke logo tum (sab) meri pairvi karo, main nek raah ki taraf tumhaari rehbari karonga
aye meri khaum! ye hayaath dunya, mata faani hai (yaqeen maano ke qaraar) aur hameshgi ka ghar to aaqirath hee hai

jis ne koyi gunaah kiya, ose us ke gunaaho ke baraabar hee badhla diya jayega aur jis ne neki ki hai, qah wo mardh ho ya aurath aur wo imaan waala ho to ye log jannath mein jayenge aur wahaa be shumaar rozi payenge
aye meri khaum! ye kya baath hai ke main tumhe najaath ki taraf bula raha hoon aur tum mujhe dozakh ki taraf bula rahe ho
tum mujhe ye daawath de rahe ho ke main Allah ke saath kufr karo aur us ke saath shirk karo jis ka koyi ilm mujhe nahi, aur main tumhe ghaalib baqshne waale maboodh ki taraf daawath de raha hoon

ye yaqini amr hai ke tum mujhe jis ki taraf bula rahe ho, wo to na dunya mein pukaare jaane ke qaabil hai, na aaqirath mein, aur ye (bhi yaqini baath hai) ke hum sab ka lautna Allah ki taraf hai aur hadh se guzar jaane waale hee, (yaqinan) ahle dozakh hai
pas aage chal kar tum meri baatho ko yaad karoge, main apna maamla Allah ke supurdh karta hoon, yaqinan Allah ta’ala bandho ka nigraan hai
pas ose Allah ta’ala ne tamaam badhiyo se mehfooz rakh liya, jo unhone soonch rakhi thi aur feraun waalo par buri tarah ka azaab ulat pada
aag hai jis ke saamne ye har subah shaam laaye jaate hai aur jis din qayaamath hogi (farmaan hoga ke) ferauniyo ko saqt tareen azaab mein daalo
aur jab ke dozakh mein ek dosre se jhagdenge to kamzoor log takabbur waalo se (jin ke ye taabe thein) kahenge ke hum to tumhaare pairau thein, to kya ab tum hum se us aag ka koyi hissa hata sakte ho
wo bade log jawaab denge hum to sabhi is aag mein hai, Allah ta’ala apne bandho ke darmiyaan faisle kar chuka hai
aur (tamaam) jahannami mil kar jahannam ke darogha se kahenge ke tum hee apne parvardigaar se dua karo ke wo kisi din to hamaare azaab mein kami karde
wo jawaab denge ke kya tumhaare paas tumhaare rasool maujeze le kar nahi aaye thein? wo kahenge kyo nahi, wo kahenge ke phir tum hee dua karo aur kaafiro ki dua mahez be asar aur be raah hai
yaqinan hum apne rasulo ki aur imaan waalo ki madad zindagaani dunya mein bhi karenge aur us din bhi jab gawaahi dene waale khade honge
jis din zaalimo ko un ki (uzr) maazirath kuch nafa na degi, un ke liye laanath hee hogi aur un ke liye bura ghar hoga
hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko hidaayath naama ata farmaya aur bani israel ko us kitaab ka waaris banaya
ke wo hidaayath wa nasihath thi aql mandho ke liye

pas aye Nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) tu sabr kar, Allah ka waada bila shak wa shuba saccha hee hai, tu apne gunaah ki maafi maangta reh aur suba shaam apne parvardigaar ki tasbih aur hamdh bayaan karta reh

jo log ba wajoodh apne paas kisi sanadh ke na hone ke, ayaath ilaahi mein jhagda karte hai, un ke dilo mein bajuz nari badaayi ke aur kuch nahi, wo us tak pahonchne waale hee nahi, so tu Allah ki panaah maangta reh, beshak wo pura sunne waala aur sab se zyaada dekhne waala hai
asmaan wa zameen ki padayish yaqinan insaan ki padayish se bahuth bada kaam hai lekin (ye aur baath hai ke) aksar log be ilm hai
andha aur bina baraabar nahi, na wo log jo imaan laaye aur bhale kaam kiye badhkaaro ke (baraabar hai), tum (bahuth) kam nasihath hasil kar rahe ho
qayaamath bil yaqeen aur be shuba aane waali hai lekin (ye aur baath hai ke) bahuth se log imaan nahi laate

aur tumhaare rab ka farmaan (sar sadh ho chuka) hai ke mujh se dua karo, main tumhaari duao ko qubool karonga, yaqeen maano ke jo log meri ibaadath se khud sarih karte hai, wo abhi abhi zaleel ho kar jahannam mein pahonch jayenge

Allah ta’ala ne tumhaare liye raath bana di ke tum us mein araam haasil karo aur din ko dekhne waala bana diya, beshak Allah ta’ala logo par fazl wa karam waala hai lekin aksar log shukr guzaari nahi karte
yahi Allah hai tum sab ka rab, har cheez ka khaaliq, us ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, phir kaha tum phire jaate ho
isi tarah wo log bhi phire jaate rahe jo Allah ki aayato ka inkaar karte thein

Allah hee hai jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko teherne ki jageh aur asmaan ko chath bana diya aur tumhaari surate banaayi aur bahuth acchi banaayi aur tumhe umdah umdah chize khaane ko ata farmaaye, yahi Allah tumhaara parvardigaar hai, pas bahuth hee barkato waala Allah hai, saare jahaan ka parvarish karne waala
wo zinda hai jis ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, pas tum qaalis osi ki ibaadath karte hoye ose pukaaro, tamaam qobiya Allah hee ke liye hai, jo tamaam jahaano ka rab hai

aap keh dijiye ke mujhe un ki ibaadath se rok diya gaya hai jinhe tum Allah ke siva pukaar rahe ho, is bina par ke mere paas mere rab ki dalile pahonch chuki hai, mujhe ye hukm diya gaya hai ke main tamaam jahaano ke rab ka taabe farmaan ho jaao

wo wahi hai jis ne tumhe mitthi se, phir nutfe se phir qoon ke luthde se payda kiya, phir tumhe bacche ki surath mein nikaalta hai, phir (tumhe badaata hai ke) tum apni puri khuwwath ko pahonch jaao, phir budhe ho jaao, tum mein se baaz us se pehle hee fauth ho jaate hai (wo tumhe chohd deta hai) ta ke tum muddath mu’ayyan tak pahoch jaao aur ta ke tum sonch samajh lo
wahi hai jo jilaata hai aur maar daalta hai, phir jab wo kisi kaam ka karna muqarrar karta hai to ose sirf ye kehta hai ke ho ja, pas wo ho jaata hai
kya tu ne unhe dekha, jo Allah ki aayato mein jhagadte hai, wo kahaa pher diye jaate hai
jin logo ne kitaab ko jhutlaaya aur ose bhi jo hum ne apne rasulo ke saath bheja, unhe abhi abhi haqiqate haal maloom ho jayegi
jab ke un ki gardano mein tauq honge aur zanjire hongi, ghasite jayenge
khaulte hoye paani mein aur phir jahannam ki aag mein jalaaye jayenge
phir un se pucha jayega ke jinhe tum shareek karte thein, wo kahaa hai
jo Allah ke siva thein, wo kahenge ke wo to hum se behek gaye, balke hum to us se pehle kisi ko bhi pukaarte hee na thein, Allah ta’ala kaafiro ko isi tarah gumraah karta hai
ye badhla hai us cheez ka jo tum zameen mein na haq phule na samaate thein aur (be ja) itraate phirte thein
(ab aao) jahannam mein hamesha rehne ke liye (us ke) darwaazo mein daakhil ho jaao, kya hee buri jageh hai takabbur karne waalo ki

pas aap sabr kare, Allah ka waada qat’an saccha hai, unhe hum ne jo waade de rakhe hai, un mein se kuch hum aap ko dikhaaye ya (us se pehle) hum aap ko wafaath de de, un ka lautna ya jaana to hamaari hee taraf hai

yaqinan hum aap se pehle bhi bahuth se rasool bhej chuke hai, jin mein se baaz ke (waqeyaath) hum aap ko bayaan kar chuke hai aur un mein se baaz ke (qisse) to hum ne aap ko bayaan hee nahi kiye aur kisi rasool ka ye (maghdoor) na tha ke koyi maujeze Allah ki ijaazath ke baghair la sa ke, phir jis waqt Allah ka hukm ayega, haq ke saath faisla kar diya jayega aur us jageh ahle baatil qasaare mein reh jayenge
Allah wo hai jis ne tumhaare liye chau paaye payda kiye, jin mein se baaz par tum sawaar hote ho, aur baaz ko tum khaate ho
aur bhi tumhaare liye in mein bahuth se nafa hai aur ta ke apne sino mein chipi hoyi haajato ko unhee par sawaari kar ke tum haasil karlo aur un chau paayo par aur kashtiyo par sawaar kiye jaate ho
Allah tumhe apni nishaaniya dikhaata ja raha hai, pas tum Allah ki kin kin nishaaniyo ka munkir bante rahoge

kya unhone zameen mein chal phir kar apne se pehlo ka anjaam nahi dekha? jo un se tadaadh mein zyaada thein, quwwath mein saqth aur zameen mein bahuth saari yaad gaare chohdi thi, un ke kiye kaamo ne unhe kuch bhi fayda na pahonchaaya
pas jab kabhi un ke paas un ke rasool khuli nishaaniya le kar aaye, to ye apne paas ke ilm par itraane lage, bil aaqir jis cheez ko mazaaq mein uda rahe thein, wahi un par ulat padi
hamaara azaab dekhte hee kehne lage, ke Allah waahed par hum imaan laaye aur jin jin ko hum us ka shareek bana rahe thein, hum ne un sab se inkaar kiya

lekin hamaare azaab ko dekh lene ke baadh un ke imaan ne unhe nafa na diya, Allah ne apna mamool yahi muqarrar kar rakha hai jo us ke bandho mein baraabar chala aa raha hai aur us jageh kaafir qaraab wa qasta hoye

khush qabri sunaane waala aur daraane waala hai, phir bhi un ki aksariyath ne mu pher liya aur wo sunte hee nahi

aur unhone kaha ke tu jis ki taraf hamein bula raha hai, hamaare dil to us se parde mein hai aur hamaare kaano mein giraani hai aur hum mein aur tujh mein ek hijaab hai, accha tu ab apna kaam kiye ja, hum bhi yaqinan kaam karne waale hai

aap keh dijiye! ke main to tumhee jaisa insaan ho, mujh par wahi naazil ki jaati hai, ke tum sab ka maboodh ek Allah hee hai, so tum us ki taraf mutawajje ho jaao aur us se gunaaho ki maafi chaaho aur un mushriko ke liye (badi hee) qaraabi hai
jo zakaath nahi dete aur aaqirath ke bhi munkir hee rehte hai
beshak jo log imaan laaye aur bhale kaam kare, un ke liye na khatam hone waala ajr hai
aap keh dijiye! ke kya tum us (Allah) ka inkaar karte ho aur tum us ke shareek muqarrar karte ho, jis ne do din mein zameen payda kardi, saare jahaano ka parvardigaar wahi hai

aur us ne zameen mein us ke upar se pahaad gaad diye aur us mein barkath rakh di aur us mein (rehne waalo ki) ghizaao ki tajweez bhi osi mein kardi (sirf) chaar din mein zarurath mandho ke liye eksa taur par
phir asmaan ki taraf mutawajje hoa aur wo dhua (sa) tha, pas ose aur zameen se farmaya ke tum duno khushi se aao ya na khushi se, duno ne arz kiya hum ba khushi haazir hai

pas do din mein saath asmaan bana diye aur har asmaan mein us ke munaasib ehkaam ki wahi bhej di aur hum ne asmaan dunya ko charaagho se zeenath di aur nigehbaani ki, ye tadhbeer Allah ghaalib wa daana ki hai
ab bhi ye ru-garda ho, to keh djiye! ke main tumhe us kadak (azaab asmaani) se daraata ho, jo misl aadhiyo aur samoodhiyo ke kadak ki hogi

un ke paas jab un ke aage piche se paighambar aaye, ke tum Allah ke siva kisi ki ibaadath na karo, to unhone jawaab diya ke, agar hamaara parvardigaar chahta to farishto ko bhejta, hum to tumhaari risaalath ke bilkul munkir hai

ab aadh ne to be wajah zameen mein sarkashi shuro kardi aur kehne lage ke hum se zoor aawar kaun hai? kya unhe ye nazar na aaya ke jis ne unhe payda kiya hai, wo un se (bahuth hee) zyaada zoor aawar hai, wo (aaqir tak) hamaari aayato ka inkaar hee karte rahe

bil aaqir hum ne un par ek tez wa tundh aandhi man’hoos dino mein bhej di, ke unhe dunyaawi zindagi mein zillath ke azaab ka maza chaka de aur (yaqeen maano) ke aaqirath ka azaab us se bahuth zyaada ruswaayi waala hai aur wo madad nahi kiye jayenge
rahe samoodh, so hum ne un ki bhi rehbari ki, phir bhi unhone hidaayath par andhe pan ko tarjih di, jis bina par unhe (saraapa) zillath ke azaab ki kadak ne unke kartuto ke baayes pakad liya
aur (haan) imaan daar aur paar saa’o ko hum ne (baal baal) bacha liya
aur jis din Allah ke dushman dozakh ki taraf laaye jayenge aur un (sab) ko jama kar diye jayega
yahaa tak ke jab bilkul jahannam ke paas aa jayenge, un par un ke kaan aur un ki aankhe aur un ki khaale un ke amaal ki gawaahi dengi

ye apni khaalo se kahenge ke tum ne hamaare qilaaf shahaadath kyo di, wo jawaab dengi ke hamein us Allah ne khuwwate goyaayi ata farmaayi, jis ne har cheez ko bolne ki taaqath baqshi hai, osi ne tumhe awwal martaba payda kiya aur osi ki taraf tum sab lautaaye jaoge

aur tum (apni badh amaaliya) is wajeh se poshida rakhte hee na thein ke tum par tumhaare kaan aur tumhaari aankhe aur tumhaari khaale gawaahi dengi, haan tum ye samajhte rahe ke, tum jo kuch bhi kar rahe ho, us mein se bahuth se amaal se Allah be qabar hai
tumhaari isi badh gumaani ne jo tum ne apne rab se kar rakhi thi, tumhe halaak kar diya aur bil aaqir tum ziyaa kaaro mein ho gaye
ab agar ye sabr kare to bhi un ka thikaana jahannam hee hai aur agar ye (uzr wa) maafi ke qaastgaar ho, to bhi (maazoor wa) maaf nahi rakhe jayenge

aur hum ne un ke kuch hum nasheen muqarrar kar rakhe thein, jinhone un ke agle pichle amaal un ki nigaaho mein qoob surath bana rakhe thein aur un ke haq mein bhi Allah ka khaul un ummato ke saath pura hoa, jo un se pehle jinno, insaano ki guzar chuki hai, yaqinan wo ziyaa kaar saabith hoye
aur kaafiro ne kaha is Qur’aan ko suno hee math (us ke padhe jaane ke waqth) aur behuda goyi karo, kya ajab ke tum ghaalib aa jaao
pas yaqinan hum un kaafiro ko saqth azaab ka maza chakayenge aur unhe un ke badh tareen amaal ka badhla (zaroor) zaroor denge
Allah ke dushmano ki saza yahi dozakh ki aag hai, jis mein un ka hameshgi ka ghar hai (ye) badhla hai hamaari aayato se inkaar karne ka

aur kaafir log kahenge aye hamaare rab! hamein jino insaano ( ke wo duno fareeq) dikha jinhone hamein gumraah kiya (ta ke) hum unhe apne khadmo ta le daal de, ta ke wo jahannam mein sab se niche (saqth azaab mein) ho jaaye

(waaqeyi) jin logo ne kaha ke hamaara parvardigaar Allah hai, phir osi par qaayam rahe, un ke paas farishte (ye kehte hoye) aate hai ke tum kuch bhi andesha aur gham na karo, balke us jannath ki bashaarath sunlo jis ka tum waada diye gaye ho
tumhaari dunyaawi zindagi mein bhi hum tumhaare rafeeq thein aur aaqirath mein bhi rahenge, jis cheez ko tumhaara ji chaahe aur jo kuch tum maango sab tumhaare liye (jannath mein maujoodh) hai
ghafoor wa raheem (maboodh) ki taraf se ye sab kuch ba taure mehmaani ke hai
aur us se zyaada acchi baath waala kaun hai jo Allah ki taraf bulaaye aur nek kaam kare aur kahe ke main yaqinan musalmaano mein se hoon
neki aur badhi baraabar nahi hoti, buraayi ko bhalaayi se dafa karo, phir wahi jis ke aur tumhaare darmiyaan dushmani hai, aisa ho jayega jaise dili dosth
aur ye baath unhee ko naseeb hoti hai jo sabr kare aur ise sivaaye bade nasibe waalo ke koyi nahi pa sakta
aur agar shaytaan ki taraf se koyi was wasa aaye to Allah ki panaah talab karo, yaqinan wo bahuth hee sunne waala jaanne waala hai

aur din raath aur suraj chaandh bhi (osi ki) nishaaniyo mein se hai, tum suraj ko sajda na karo, na chaandh ko, balke sajda us Allah ke liye karo, jis ne un sab ko payda kiya hai, agar tumhe osi ki ibaadath karni hai to
phir bhi agar ye kibr wa ghuroor kare, to wo (farishte) jo aap ke rab ke nazdeek hai, wo to raath din us ki tasbih bayaan kar rahe hai aur (kisi waqt bhi) nahi uktaate

us Allah ki nishaaniyo mein se (ye bhi) hai ke tu zameen ko dabi dabaayi dekhta hai, phir jab hum us par meh barsaata hai, to wo taru taaza ho kar ubharne lagti hai, jis ne ose zinda kiya, wahi yaqini taur par murdo ko bhi zinda karne waala hai, beshak wo har (har) cheez par qaadir hai

beshak jo log hamaari aayato mein kaj rawi karte hai, wo (kuch) hum se maqfi nahi, (batlaao to) jo aag mein daala jaaye, wo accha hai ya wo jo aman wa amaan ke saath qayaamath ke din aaye? tum jo chaaho karte chale jaao, wo tumhara sab kiya karaaya dekh raha hai
jin logo ne apne paas Qur’aan pahonch jaane ke ba-wajoodh us se kufr kiya (wo bhi hum se poshida nahi) ye badi ba-waq-ath1 kitaab hai
jis ke paas baatil phatak bhi nahi sakta, na us ke aage se na us ke piche se, ye hai nazil karda hikmato waale qobiyo waale (Allah) ki taraf se
aap se wahi kaha jaata hai jo aap se pehle ke rasulo se bhi kaha gaya hai, yaqinan aap ka rab maafi waala aur dardnaak azaab waala hai

aur agar hum ose ajami zabaan ka Qur’aan banaate to, kehte ke is ki aayate saaf saaf bayaan kyo nahi ki gayi? ye kya ke ajami kitaab aur aap arabi rasool? aap keh dijiye! ke ye to imaan waalo ke liye hidaayath wa shifa hai aur jo imaan nahi laate, un ke kaano mein to (behrapan aur) boojh hai aur ye un par andha pan hai, ye log hai jo kisi bahuth door daraaz jageh se pukaare ja rahe hai

yaqinan hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko kitaab di thi, so us mein bhi eqtelaaf kiya gaya aur agar (wo) baath na hoti (jo) aap ke rab ki taraf se pehle hee muqarrar ho chuki hai, to un ke darmiyaan kabhi ka faysla ho chuka hota, ye log to us ke baare mein saqth be chayn karne waale shak mein hai
jo shaqs nek kaam karega, wo apne nafe ke liye aur jo bura kaam karega, us ka wabaal bhi osi par hai aur aap ka rab bandho par zulm karne waala nahi

qayaamath ka ilm Allah hee ki taraf lautaaya jaata hai aur jo jo phal apne shagufo mein se nikalte hai aur jo maada hamal se hoti hai aur jo bacche wo janthi hai, sab ka ilm ose hai aur jis din Allah ta’ala un (mushriko) ko bula kar daryaaft farmayega mere shareek kahaa hai, wo jawaab denge ke hum ne to tujhe keh sunaaya ke hum mein se to koyi is ka gawaah nahi
aur ye jin (jin) ki parastish is se pehle karte thein, wo un ki nigaah se gum ho gaye aur unhone samajh liya ke ab un ke liye koyi bachaao nahi
bhalaayi ke maangne se, insaan thakta nahi aur agar ose koyi takleef pahonch jaaye to mayoos aur na ummidh ho jaata hai

aur jo musibath ose pahonch chuki hai, us ke baadh agar hum ose kisi rehmath ka maza chakaaye to, wo keh uthta hai ke is ka to main haqdaar hee tha aur main to qayaal nahi kar sakta ke qayaamath qaayam hogi aur agar main apne rab ke paas waapas kiya gaya to bhi yaqinan mere liye us ke paas bhi behetri hai, yaqinan hum un kuffaar ko un ke amaal se qabardaar karenge aur unhe saqth azaab ka maza chakayenge
aur jab hum insaan par apna in’aan karte hai to wo mu pher leta hai aur kinaara kash ho jaata hai aur jab ose musibath padti hai to badi lambi chaudi duaaye karne waala ban jaata hai
aap keh dijiye ke bhala ye to bataao ke agar ye Qur’aan Allah ki taraf se ayaa hoa ho, phir tum ne ose na maana, bas us se bad kar behka hoa kaun hoga jo muqaalifath mein (haq se) door chala jaaye

asmaano ki(tamaam) cheeze aur jo kuch zameen mein hai sab osi ka hai, wo bartar aur azeem osh shaan hai

qareeb hai asmaan upar se phat pade, aur tamaam farishte apne rab ki paaki tareef ke saath bayaan kar rahe hai aur zameen waalo ke liye isteghfaar kar rahe hai, qoob samajh rakho ke Allah ta’ala hee maaf farmaane waala, rehmath waala hai
aur jin logo ne us ke siva dosro ko kaar saaz bana liya hai, Allah ta’ala un par nigraan hai aur aap un ke zimmedaar nahi hai

isi tarah hum ne aap ki taraf arabi Qur’aan ki wahi ki hai, ta ke aap makke waalo ko aur us ke aas paas ke logo ko qabardaar karde, aur jama hone ke din se jis ke aane mein koyi shak nahi, dara de, ek gruh jannath mein hoga aur ek gruh jahannam mein hoga
agar Allah ta’ala chahta to un sab ko ek hee ummath ka bana deta, lekin wo jise chaahta hai, apni rahmath mein daakhil kar leta hai aur zaalimo ka haami aur madadgaar koyi nahi
kya un logo ne Allah ta’ala ke siva aur kaar saaz bana liye hai (haqiqatan to) Allah ta’ala hee kaar saaz hai, wahi murdo ko zinda karega aur wahi har cheez par qaadir hai
aur jis jis cheez mein tumhaara eqtelaaf ho, us ka faysla Allah ta’ala hee ki taraf hai, yahi Allah mera rab hai, jis par main ne bharosa kar rakha hai aur jis ki taraf main jhukta hoon

wo asmaano aur zameen ka payda karne waala hai, us ne tumhaare liye tumhaari jins ke jode bana diye hai aur chaupaayo ke jode banaaye hai, tumhe wo us mein phayla raha hai, us jaisi koyi cheez nahi, wo sunne aur dekhne waala hai
asmaano aur zameen ki konjiya osi ki hai, jis ki chaahe rozi kushaada karde aur tang karde, yaqinan wo har cheez ko jaanne waala hai

Allah ta’ala ne tumhaare liye wahi deen muqarrar kar diya hai, jis ke qaayam karne ka us ne Nuh (alaihissalaam) ko hukm diya tha aur jo (ba zariye wahi) hum ne teri taraf bhej di hai aur jis ka taakidi hukm hum ne Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) aur Mosa(alaihissalaam) aur Isa(alaihissalaam) ko diya tha, ke is deen ko qaayam rakhna aur us mein phot na daalna, jis cheez ki taraf aap unhe bula rahe hai, wo to (un) mushrikeen par gira guzarti hai, Allah ta’ala jise chaahta hai, apna barguzida banaata hai aur jo bhi us ki taraf rujo kare, wo us ki sahih rehnumaayi karta hai

un logo ne apne paas ilm aa jaane ke baadh hee eqtelaaf kiya (aur wo bhi) baahmi zidh bahes se aur agar aap ke rab ki baath ek waqth muqarrar tak ke liye pehle hee se qaraar pa gayi hoyi na hoti, to yaqinan un ka faysla ho chuka hota aur jin logo ko un ke baadh kitaab di gayi hai, wo bhi us ki taraf se uljhan waale shak mein pade hoye hai

pas aap logo ko osi taraf bulaate rahe aur jo kuch aap se kaha gaya hai, us par mazbooti se jam jaaye aur un ki qaahisho par na chale aur kehde ke Allah ta’ala ne jitni kitaabe naazil farmaayi hai, mera un par imaan hai aur mujhe hukm diya gaya hai ke tum mein insaaf karta raho, hamaara aur tum sab ka parvardigaar Allah hee hai, hamaare amaal hamaare liye hai aur tumhaare amaal tumhaare liye hai, hum tum mein koyi kat hujjati nahi, Allah ta’ala hum (sab) ko jama karega aur osi ki taraf lautna hai
aur jo log Allah ta’ala ki baatho mein jhagda daalte hai, us ke baadh ke (maqlooq) ose maan chuki, un ki kat hujjati Allah ke nazdeek baatil hai aur un par ghazab hai aur un ke liye saqth azaab hai
Allah ta’ala ne haq ke saath kitaab naazil farmaayi hai aur taraazu bhi (utaari hai) aur aap ko kya qabar shaayad, qayaamath qareeb hee ho

us ki jaldi unhe padi hai jo ose nahi maante aur jo us par yaqeen rakhte hai wo to us se dar rahe hai, unhe us ke haq hone ka pura ilm hai, yaad rakho jo log qayaamath ke maamle mein lad jhagad rahe hai, wo door ki gumraahi mein pade hoye hai
Allah ta’ala apne bandho par bada hee lutf karne waala hai, jise chaahta hai kushaada rozi deta hai aur wo badi taaqath, bade ghalbe waala hai

jis ka iraada aaqirath ki kheti ka ho, hum ose us ki kheti mein taraqqi denge aur jo dunya ki kheti ki talab rakhta ho, hum ose us mein se hee kuch de denge, aise shaqs ka aaqirath mein koyi hissa nahi

kya un logo ne aise (Allah ke) shareek (muqarrar kar rakhe) hai jinhone aise ehkaam deen muqarrar kar diye hai, jo Allah ke farmaaye hoye nahi hai, agar faysle ke din ka waada na hota, to (abhi hee) un mein faysla kar diya jaata, yaqinan (un) zaalimo ke liye hee dardnaak azaab hai

aap dekhenge ke ye zaalim apne amaal se dar rahe honge, jin ke wabaal un par waaqeyi hone waale hai, aur jo log imaan laaye aur unhone nek amaal kiye, wo bahishto ke baghaath mein honge, wo jo qaahish kare, apne rab ke paas maujoodh payenge, yahi hai bada fazl

yahi wo hai jis ki bashaarath Allah ta’ala apne un bandho ko de raha hai, jo imaan laaye aur (sunnath ke mutaabiq) nek amal kiye, to keh djiye ke main us par tum se koyi badhla nahi chaahta, magar muhabbath rishtedaari ki, jo shaqs koyi neki kare, hum us ke liye us ki neki mein aur neki bada denge, beshak Allah ta’ala bahuth baqshne waala (aur) bahuth qadardaan hai

kya ye kehte hai ke (paighambar ne) Allah par jhoot baandha hai, agar Allah ta’ala chaahe to aap ke dil par muhar laga de aur Allah ta’ala apni baatho se jhoot ko mita deta hai aur sach ko saabith rakhta hai, wo sine ki baatho ko jaanne waala hai
wahi hai jo apne bandho ki tauba qubool farmaata hai aur gunaaho se dar-guzar farmaata hai aur jo kuch tum kar rahe ho (sab) jaanta hai
imaan waalo aur nekokaar logo ki sunta hai aur unhe apne fazl se aur bada kar deta hai aur kuffaar ke liye saqth azaab hai

agar Allah ta’ala apne (sab) bandho ki rozi faraagh kar deta, to wo zameen mein fasaadh barpa kar dete, lekin wo andaaze ke saath jo kuch chaahta hai, nazil farmaata hai, wo apne bandho se pura qabardaar hai aur qoob dekhne waala hai
aur wahi hai jo logo ke na-ummidh ho jaane ke baadh baarish barsaata hai aur apni rahmath phayla deta hai, wahi hai kaar-saaz aur qaabile hamdh wa sana
aur us ki nishaaniyo mein se asmaano aur zameen ki paydayish hai aur un mein jaan-daaro ka phaylaana hai, wo us par bhi qaadir hai ke jab chaahe unhe jama karde
tumhe jo kuch musibate pahonchti hai, wo tumhaare apne haatho ke kartooth ka badhla hai aur wo to bahuth si baatho se dar guzar farma deta hai
aur tum hamein zameen mein aajiz karne waale nahi ho, tumhaare liye sivaaye Allah ta’ala ke na koyi kaar-saaz hai, na madadgaar
aur darya mein chalne waali pahaado jaisi kashtiyaa, us ki nishaaniyo mein se hai
agar wo chaahe to hawa bandh karde aur ye kashtiya samandaro par ruki reh jaaye, yaqinan is mein har sabr karne waale shukr guzaar ke liye nishaniya hai
ya unhe un ke kartuto ke baayes tabaah karde, wo to bahuth si khataao se darguzar farmaaya karta hai
aur ta ke jo log hamaari nishaaniyo mein jhagadte hai, wo maloom karle ke un ke liye koyi chutkaara nahi

to tumhe jo kuch diya gaya hai wo zindagaani dunya ka kuch yo hee sa asbaab hai aur Allah ke paas jo hai, wo us se badarja behtar aur paaye daar hai, wo un ke liye hai jo imaan laaye aur sirf apne rab hee par bharosa rakhte hai
aur kabira gunaaho se, be hayaaiyo se bachte hai aur ghusse ke waqt (bhi) maaf kar dete hai
aur apne rab ke farmaan ko qubool karte hai aur namaaz ki paabandi karte hai aur un ka har kaam aapas ke mashwere se hota hai aur jo hum ne unhe de rakha hai, us mein se (hamaare naam par) dete hai
aur jab un par zulm (wa zyaadati) ho, to wo sirf badhla le lete hai
aur burayi ka badhla osi jaisi burayi hai aur jo maaf karde aur islaah karle, us ka ajr Allah ke zimme hai (fil waaqe) Allah ta’ala zaalimo se muhabbath nahi karta
aur jo shaqs apne mazloom hone ke baadh (baraabar ka) badhla le le, to aise logo par (ilzaam ka) koyi raasta nahi
ye raasta sirf un logo par hai jo khud dosro par zulm kare aur zameen mein na haq fasaadh karte phire, yahi log hai jin ke liye dardnaak azaab hai
aur jo shaqs sabr karle aur maaf karde, yaqinan ye badi himmath ke kaamo mein se (ek kaam) hai
aur jise Allah ta’ala behka de, us ka us ke baadh koyi chaara saaz nahi aur tu dekhega ke zaalim log azaab ko dekh kar keh rahe honge ke kya waapas jaane ki koyi raah hai

aur tu unhe dekhega ke wo (jahannam ke) saamne la khade kiye jayenge, maare zillath ke jhuke ja rahe honge aur kin ankhiyo se dekh rahe honge, imaan waale saaf kahenge ke haqiqi ziyaa kaar1 wo hai jinhone aaj qayaamath ke din apne aap ko aur apne ghar waalo ko nuqsaan mein daal diya, yaad rakho ke yaqinan zaalim log dayimi azaab mein hai
un ke koyi madagaar nahi, jo Allah ta’ala se alag un ki imdaad kar sake aur jise Allah gumraah karde, us ke liye koyi raasta hee nahi
apne rab ka hukm maan lo, us se pehle ke Allah ki jaanib se wo din aa jaaye jis ka hat jaana na mumkin hai, tumhe us roz na to koyi panaah ki jageh milegi na chup kar anjaan ban jaane ki

agar ye mu pher le to hum ne aap ko un par nigehbaan bana kar nahi bheja, aap ke zimme to sirf paighaam pahoncha dena hai, hum jab kabhi insaan ko apni meherbaani ka maza chakaate hai, to wo us par itra jaata hai aur agar unhe un ke amaal ki wajeh se koyi musibath pahonchti hai to beshak insaan bada hee na shukra hai
asmaano ki aur zameen ki saltanath Allah ta’ala hee ke liye hai, wo jo chahta hai payda karta hai, jis ko chahta hai betiya deta hai aur jise chahta hai bete deta hai
ya unhe jama kar deta hai, bete bhi aur betiya bhi aur jise chaahe baanjh kar deta hai, wo bade ilm waala aur kaamil khudrath waala hai

na mumkin hai ke kisi bandhe se Allah ta’ala kalaam kare, magar wahi ke zariye ya pardeh ke piche se ya kisi farishte ko bheje aur wo Allah ke hukm se jo wo chaahe wahi kare, beshak wo bartar hai hikmath waala hai

aur isi tarah hum ne aap ki taraf apne hukm se ruh ko utaara hai, aap us se pehle ye bhi nahi jaante thein ke kitaab aur imaan kya cheez hai? lekin hum ne ose noor banaya, us ke zariye se apne bandho mein se jise chaahte hai hidaayath dete hai, beshak aap raahe raasth ki rehnumaayi kar rahe hai
us Allah ki raah ki jis ki milkiyath mein asmaano aur zameen ki har cheez hai, agaah raho, sab kaam Allah ta’ala hee ki taraf lauthte hai

aur bil yaqeen hum apne rab ki taraf laut kar jaane waale hai
aur unhone Allah ke baaz bandho ko us ka juz tehra diya, yaqinan insaan khullam khulla na shukra hai

aur unhone farishto ko jo rahmaan ke ibaadat guzaar hai aurte qaraar de liya, kya un ki padayish ke mauqe par ye maujoodh thein? un ki ye gawaahi likh li jayegi aur un se (is cheez ki) baaz purs ki jayegi
aur kehte hai agar Allah chahta to hum un ki ibaadath na karte, unhe us ki kuch qabar nahi, ye to sirf atkal piccho (jhoot baatein) kehte hai
kya hum ne unhe is se pehle koyi (aur) kitaab di hai jise ye mazbooth thaame hoye hai
(nahi nahi) balke ye to kehte hai ke hum ne apne baap dada ko ek maz’hab par paaya, aur hum un hee ke naqsh khadam par chal kar raah yaafta hai

isi tarah aap se pehle bhi hum ne jis basti mein koyi daraane waala bheja, wahaa ke aasuda haal logo ne yahi jawaab diya ke hum ne apne baap dada ko (ek raah par) aur ek deen par paaya aur hum to unhee ke naqshe pa ki pairvi karne waale hai

pas hum ne un se inteqaam liya aur dekh le jhutlaane waalo ka kaisa anjaam hoa
aur jab ke Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne apne waalid se aur apni khaum se farmaaya ke main un chizo se bezaar hoon, jin ki tum ibaadath karte ho
bajuz us zaath ke jis ne mujhe paida kiya hai aur wahi mujhe hidaayath bhi karega
aur (Ibraheem(alaihissalaam)) osi ko apni aulaad mein bhi baaqi rehne waali baath qaayam kar gaye, ta ke log (shirk se) baaz aate rahe
balke main ne un logo ko aur un ke baap dadaao ko samaan (aur asbaab) diya, yahaan tak ke un ke paas haq aur saaf saaf sunaane waala rasool aa gaya
aur haq ke pahochte hee ye bol pade ke ye to jaadu hai aur hum is ke munkir hai
aur kehne lage ye Qur’aan un duno bastiyo mein se kisi bade aadmi par kyo na naazil kiya gaya

aur sone ke bhi aur ye sab kuch yo hee sa dunya ki zindagi ka fayda hai aur aaqirath to aap ke rab ke nazdik (sirf) parhezgaaro ke liye (hee) hai
aur jo shaqs rahmaan ki yaad se ghaflath kare, hum us par ek shaytaan muqarrar kar dete hai, wahi us ka saathi rehta hai

aur jab ke tum zaalim teher chuke to tumhe aaj hargiz tum sab ka azaab mein shareek hona koyi nafa na dega
kya pas tu behre ko suna sakta hai ya andhe ko raah dikha sakta hai aur ose jo khuli gumraahi mein ho
pas agar hum tujhe yahaa se le bhi jaaye to bhi hum un se badhla lene waale hai
ya jo kuch un se waada kiya hai wo tujhe dikha de, hum un par bhi khudrath rakhte hai
pas jo wahi aap ki taraf ki gayi hai ose mazbooth thaame rahe, beshak aap raahe raasth par hai

aur hamaare un nabiyo se pucho! jinhe hum ne aap se pehle bheja tha, ke kya hum ne sivaaye rahmaan ke aur maboodh muqarrar kiye thein jin ki ibaadath ki jaaye
aur hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko apni nishaniya de kar feraun aur us ke ham raah ke paas bheja to (Mosa (alaihissalaam) ne ja kar) kaha ke main tamaam jahaano ke rab ka rasool hoon
pas jab wo hamaari nishaaniya le kar un ke paas aaye to wo be saaqta un par hasne lage
aur hum unhe jo nishaani dikhaate thein wo dosri se badi chadi hoti thi aur hum ne unhe azaab mein pakda, ta ke wo baaz aa jaaye
aur unhone kaha aye jaadugar! hamaare liye apne rab se us ki dua kar, jis ka us ne tujh se waada kar rakha hai, yaqeen maan ke hum raah par lag jayenge
phir jab hum ne wo azaab un se hata liya, unhone osi waqt apna khaul wa qaraar tod diya
aur feraun ne apni khaum mein munaadi karaayi aur kaha aye meri khaum! kya misr ka mulk mera nahi ? aur mere (mehlo ke) niche ye nehre beh rahi hai, kya tum dekhte nahi
balke mein behtar hoon ba nisbath us ke jo be-tauqeer1 hai aur saaf bol bhi nahi sakta

aur pukaar pukaar kar kahenge ke aaye maalik! tera rab hamaara kaam hee tamaam karde, wo kahega ke tumhe to (hamesha) rehna hai

jinhe ye log Allah ke siva pukaarte hai wo shifa’ath karne ka etiyaar nahi rakhte, haan (mustaheq shifa’ath wo hai) jo haq baath ka eqraar kare aur unhe ilm bhi ho
